name: BEST WESTERN Pioneer Inn & Suites

reviews.title: Nice Place
reviews.text: I was really worried about this hotel because in the Best Western book it didn't have any stars and thier were no pictures of the room. I am very picky about the rooms and I thought they were big and roomy. Everything worked good and the pool was nice. The kids had a good time and my husband went gambling. They have a shuttle to the casino and thier is a pizza place in the hotel--pizza's okay, but nothing special and then thier is a fancy restarant which we had the breakfast buffet the next morning for $5 a person which was pretty good. The dinner menu had alot of fancy stuff that I have never eatten and then steaks which I usually don't order and it was expensive $13 and up.

reviews.title: Little gem of a hotel.
reviews.text: Excellent hotel in the center of town with friendly staff, clean rooms and nice restaurant. We never received actual verification that the chef is one of the top 3 in Michigan as the front desk boasted. However, it could be true. The meal was exceptionally good and the service, excellent. The pork dish is their specialty and the home made desserts were delicious. If you are travelling through this area and need a place to stay, this is it!

We booked this hotel the morning before we arrived as it was raining in Mackinac and we decided to start our trip home early. We booked this hotel because it was the only non-smoking room available in Escanaba for the evening. It was a king room w/ a sofa bed, microwave, and fridge. Very large and very nice room! The hotel gave us two free drink coupons for the hotel bar and breakfast was free as well. The breakfast was a hot buffet with pancakes, eggs, sausages, potatoes, biscuits/gravy, etc. Check-in was quick and easy and the staff was very nice. We had requested a crib and it was not in the room but the staff brought us a crib within a few minutes once we called them. Nothing about this hotel that I can complain about!
reviews.title: Nice surprise for a last minute change!

reviews.text: We were planning on staying at the Best Western in Escanaba, MI for eight days for the Christmas holiday. We were expecting a room with two queen beds, a full pull out couch, microwave and fridge. When we got there we were told the heater in our room was out and that we would be put into adjoining rooms for the night. that was fine! I understand that heaters go out in the winter! We got into our rooms (by the way, we have two adults and three children) the heater in one room didn't work, in the same room I found moldy, yes moldy, coffee in the coffee pot and when i tried to pour it out the sink was clogged. I called the front desk explaining the problem and was rudely told that they would look into it and to just sleep in the other room. (have you ever tried squeezing five people into two queen beds?). the next day we were told our orginial room was ready and to just wait half an hour for the heater to warm up the room. Great! 45 mins later we were informed that our room was no longer available and the would "be willing to allow" us to stay in our current room and they would "try" to get the heater and sink fixed. WHAT!!!!!
reviews.title: What a disaster!!!

likes.disliked: — please read my review, there isn't enough room here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Needless to say we left. Oh but wait, they did do us the favor of only charging us the one night we were there even though we left after check-out time. (oh, and did i mention that when i asked when the pool would be open the receptionist rolled his eyes and said "I guess i could have someone open for you if you really need to swim."!!!!!

reviews.text: We ended up staying at the Travel Lodge down the street. A step or two down yes, but we got a huge room with three beds, fridge, microwave and treated with more respect than most 5 star resorts.
reviews.title: Average best western

description: Welcome to Best Western Pioneer Inn & Suites!Looking for a quiet getaway? The Best Western Pioneer Inn & Suites provides a great night's sleep and much more! Grab a bite to eat and enjoy the wonderful atmosphere at Pacino's, our hotel restaurant. Our property is conveniently located on the west end of Escanaba. We provide the perfect answer for the business traveler, tourist, sportsman, and senior citizen. Located just minutes from the mall, Family Fun Park, cinema, and downtown. Also located only two miles from Ludington Park on Little Bay de Noc, the beach and the greatest walleye fishing in the U.P. Nature is all around us! Our hotel is minutes from the water and hiking/ORV trails. Enjoy a round of golf at one of our five area courses, all located within ten miles of our property. Our friendly staff is here to ensure that you have a wonderful vacation. SORRY, WE DO NOT ACCEPT PETS!
